channel.title: Help with shops
channel.description: Ok so i was working on a shop that would sell dragon baxe and dragon sword right...my problem is that once in the shop the value of the item when u try to buy it doesnt match what the basevalue is in the itemdef.xml file....also when u try to buy or sell the item it doesnt do anything. i have noticed this in a few of the other private servers i used to play in...anyone know how to fix this problem? ive been looking at all the files that i think would have something to do with this and i cant figure out where the problem is...its rscd source (atleast i think it is...its the source code for project p2p i know for sure)

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @Deathman17 Deathman17
item.description:
@Deathman17 wrote:

thanks bro big help…never had to do that before so i didnt know about it…fixed both my problems =)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Download 7zip Portable.

Open Items.rscd with 7zipPortable (it’s a compressed version of the XML file).

Edit whatever you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with shops
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

You also need to change the base price of the item in your client conf folder via items.rscd. Then you will be able to buy and sell it at the price you want.

Read full topic
